categories: Category:Events during the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Duel in the Odacer-Faustin Sith Temple

A duel took place at the Odacer-Faustin Sith academy in 3645 BBY when the Sith Lord Darth Scabrous attempted to kill Hestizo Trace and eat her heart in order to grant himself eternal life with the assistance of a virus he engineered.
